Package edu.cnm.deepdive.tunefull.model.dao

Interface RelationshipRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Relationship,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Relationship,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Relationship,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Relationship>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Relationship,​java.lang.Long>
    public interface RelationshipRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Relationship,​java.lang.Long>

    RelationshipRepository holds data for relationship, with the following methods; getRelationshipsByRequesterAndFriendRelationshipTrue, getRelationshipsByRequestedAndFriendRelationshipTrue, getRelationshipsByRequesterAndFriendRelationshipTrueOrRequestedAndFriendRelationshipTrue, getRelationshipsByRequesterAndFriendRelationshipFalse, getRelationshipsByRequestedAndFriendAcceptedNull.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Optional<Relationship> getRelationshipById​(java.lang.Long id)  
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<Relationship>> getRelationshipsByRequestedAndFriendAcceptedNull​(User requested)
      Gets all unaccepted friendships for a particular requested (i.e., requests that that user hasn't responded to yet).
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<Relationship>> getRelationshipsByRequestedAndFriendRelationshipTrue​(User requested)
      Gets all accepted friendships for a particular requested, in no particular order
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<Relationship>> getRelationshipsByRequesterAndFriendRelationshipFalse​(User requester)
      Gets all follows for a particular user/requester
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<Relationship>> getRelationshipsByRequesterAndFriendRelationshipTrue​(User requester)
      The following two would have to be combined, as in line 20?? Gets all friendships for a particular requester, in no particular order
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<Relationship>> getRelationshipsByRequesterAndFriendRelationshipTrueOrRequestedAndFriendRelationshipTrue​(User requester, User requested)
      Gets all accepted friendships for a particular user - requester and requested should be the same id in this case, just passed in twice
